title: afks 5 games in a row worst thing ever in ranked to get ranked based on afks and trying your best

I don't know if anyone else had this unpleasant experience it got to me because it want just one afk it was every match for five matches something must be done about this so other people don't suffer like i did the gaming experience sucks and u cant move forward because of idiots that just afk. i want something to be done about this shit
